org.apache.twill.api

Interface TwillSpecification.PlacementPolicy

  • Enclosing interface:
    TwillSpecification

    public static interface TwillSpecification.PlacementPolicy
    Defines a container placement policy.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  TwillSpecification.PlacementPolicy.Type
      Lists different types of Placement Policies available.

      • getNames

        Set<String> getNames()
        Returns:
